sense.def: Illness Sign ofa) intra-abdominal cramps with an uncomfortable feeling of pain. Jin gui yao lue 金匱要略 Lj: 暮即發熱，少腹裏急 , “Heat effuses at sunset, and there is a feeling of internal tension in the lower abdomen”.b) a feeling of an urge to defecate. Xuan ming lun fang 宣明論方 10: 泄瀉膿血，四肢沉重，臍腹疼痛，裏急，夜起頻並 , “Outflow with pus and blood, the four limbs feel very heavy. Pain in the region of navel and abdomen. Internal tension [urges people to defecate] several times during the night”.
